name: Crazy Cabbie
description:
Controls:

Mouse - Move cursor to point the car
Left click - Accelerate
Right click - Boost

----------Credits----------

Art:
Background image - https://opengameart.org/content/pixel-night-city (fridairuiz)

Road tiles - https://opengameart.org/content/road-tile-textures (hc)

Taxi (adjusted) - https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-police-car (Basto)

Sound:
Background music - https://opengameart.org/content/railjet-long-seamless-loop (DST / qubodup)

People walking around - https://opengameart.org/content/characters-2 (pondomaniac)

Flame icon on boost bar - https://opengameart.org/content/pixel-art-flame-icon (bart)

Passenger nun - https://opengameart.org/content/nun (antumdeluge)

Running things over sound - https://opengameart.org/content/40-cc0-water-splash-slime-sfx (rubberduck)
